actions: *Melee Spell Attack:* +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:* 18 (4d8) fire damage.
*Ranged Spell Attack:* +5 to hit, range 90 ft., one target. *Hit:* 40 (9d8) fire damage.

Severin chooses a point he can see within 60 feet of him. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 (4d8) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
damage resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from nonmagical attacks
description: > Severin has a neutral evil **pseudodragon** companion named Nelvik. The pseudodragon is never far from its master. During the ritual to summon Tiamat, it cowers on a ledge in the central spire of the Dragon Queen's temple. If Severin is slain, Nelvik attempts to befriend Severin's slayers, waiting for an opportune time to exact revenge.
legendary actions: If Severin is wearing the *Mask of the Dragon Queen*, he can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. Severin regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

Severin, along with any objects he is wearing or carrying, teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. Each creature within 5 feet of Severin before he teleports takes 5 (1d10) fire damage.

Severin targets one creature he can see within 30 feet of him. The target is wrapped in magical chains of fire and restrained. The restrained target takes 21 (6d6) fire damage at the start of each of its turns. At the end of its turns, the target can make a DC 17 Strength saving throw, ending the effect on itself on a success.
name: Severin
traits: Severin has the *Mask of the Dragon Queen*.
Severin only has his damage immunities, damage resistances, condition immunities, and darkvision while wearing the *Mask of the Dragon Queen*.
Severin adds his Charisma bonus to his AC (included).

If Severin deals fire damage to a creature while wearing the *Mask of the Dragon Queen*, the target catches fire. At the start of each of its turns, the burning target takes 5 (1d10) fire damage. A creature within reach of the fire can use an action to extinguish it.
While wearing the *Mask of the Dragon Queen*, if Severin fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.
